template.description: Creates a strongly typed array using ObjectTranslator. Type the array name, highlight it and initiate code completion (ctrl + space). Type the class at the prompt & use autocomplete to import it.
template.name: strongly typed Array

template.description: Creates a strongly typed property using ObjectTranslator. Type the property name, highlight it & initiate code completion. Type the class at the prompt & use autocomplete to import it.
template.name: strongly typed object property
